Louisville_Jefferson_County.Corn Island (Kentucky):
Corn Island is a now-vanished 7-acre (28,000 m2) island in the Ohio River, at head of the Falls of the Ohio, just north of Louisville, Kentucky.


== Geography ==
Estimates of the size of Corn Island vary with time as it gradually was eroded and became submerged. A 1780 survey listed its size at 43 acres (170,000 m2).
